markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primeval Mistletoe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3100)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sprig of berry-festooned holly and mistletoe doesn't wilt or rot. It can be used as a primal locus, and it grants a +1 item bonus to Nature checks while you wear it. 

**Activate—Anoint** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per 10 minutes;   **Effect** You squeeze juice from one of the berries and smear it onto a weapon made primarily of wood to cast [_runic weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1658) on it, or onto a creature to cast [_runic body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1657) on it. 

**Activate—Bind** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You touch the sprig, then a tree to cast [_one with plant_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618) upon yourself, turning into a vine on the touched tree.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Primeval Mistletoe
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 574 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 230 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Primeval Mistletoe (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 574 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 3,900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The sprig grants a +2 item bonus to Nature checks, the spell from Anoint is heightened to 6th rank, and the sprig can be activated in one additional way:

**Activate—Cultivate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You plant the _greater primeval mistletoe_ into an area of natural earth or stone. Once planted, the plant immediately sprouts into an area of holly bushes that don't impede movement and that pulse with vitality energy, replicating the effects of a [_field of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=114) spell. You can Sustain the activation up to 1 minute. When this magic ends, the holly bushes revert back into the original _greater primeval mistletoe_.
name: Primeval Mistletoe
